short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to create and collaborate in the world

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Padlet is a canvas to create beautiful projects that are easy to share and collaborate on. 

It works like a piece of paper. We give you an empty page - a padlet - and you can put whatever you like on it. Drag in a video, record an interview, snap a selfie, write your own text posts or upload some documents, and voil√†! A padlet is born. Make it even more beautiful by choosing custom wallpapers and themes.

5 million people are already using Padlet for:

Portfolios
Opinion forums
Lesson plans
Bios
Real estate listings
Timelines
Blogs
Q+A
To-Do list
Inspiration board
Writing prompts
Collecting feedback
Collaborative note-taking
Photo collages 
Solo or group presentations
Group greeting cards
RSVPs
Pen Pal messages
Professional Development
